title: Meiktila University of Economics
text: The Meiktila University of Economics (, ), located in <a href="Meiktila">Meiktila</a>, <a href="Mandalay%20Region">Mandalay Region</a>, is one of three universities of <a href="economics">economics</a> and <a href="business%20school">business</a> in <a href="Myanmar">Myanmar</a>. The institute offers undergraduate and graduate degrees and diplomas, mostly in <a href="commerce">commerce</a>, <a href="statistics">statistics</a> and <a href="economics">economics</a>. It also has a small number of graduate degree programs, including a full-time <a href="MBA">MBA</a> and <a href="Master%20of%20Public%20Administration">MPA</a> program as well as Ph.D. Programs.
